name: Shoulder Press, on Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Adjust the machine seat height to suit your body.
2. Sit down on the shoulder press machine and secure yourself in place with the safety bar.
3. Grasp the handles firmly with your hands shoulder-width apart (or as per specifications).
4. Extend your arms fully, pressing your shoulders against the back pad to ensure full range of motion.
5. Slowly lower the weight by bending your elbows, keeping control throughout the movement.
6. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement to maintain a slight stretch in your shoulders and upper body.
7. Press the weight upwards, using your shoulder muscles to lift.
8. Continue for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Shoulder press on machine is an isolated exercise that targets the front and lateral deltoids effectively, allowing you to build more balanced and symmetrical muscle mass across the shoulders.
